snippet: Gloria Steinem said that Christine C. Quinn, the City Council speaker, had distinguished herself as a skilled politician who fought for the rights of women, immigrants and families.
abstract: Gloria Steinem, feminist writer and activist, says she will endorse City Council speaker Christine C Quinn in New York mayoral race, after Quinn added her support to paid time off for sick workers bill.
lead_paragraph: Gloria Steinem said that Christine C. Quinn, the City Council speaker, had distinguished herself as a skilled politician who fought for the rights of women, immigrants and families.

headline.seo: Steinem to Endorse Quinn for Mayor
headline.main: Sick-Pay Deal Lets Steinem Back Quinn for Mayor
headline.print_headline: Sick-Pay Deal Lets Steinem Back Quinn For Mayor
